sqlMap.select:
SELECT ESNTL_ID, USER_ID, USER_NM, FN_CD_NM(RSPOFC_CD) AS RSPOFC_NM, FN_CD_NM(CLSF_CD) AS CLSF_NM, FN_DEPT_NM(DEPT_CD) AS DEPT_NM, ( SELECT COUNT(*) FROM RC_TMPR RT WHERE RT.PROGRS_STTUS_CD NOT IN (SELECT ESNTL_CD FROM CMN_CD WHERE UPPER_CD = '02100' AND CD_DC = 'END')
AND RT.CHARGER_ID = U.ESNTL_ID ) AS ALOT_CNT FROM CMN_USER U WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND CONFM_YN = 'Y' AND DEPT_CD IN ( SELECT DC.DEPT_CD FROM CMN_DEPT_CD DC WHERE DC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DC.DEPT_CD != '00000' START WITH DC.DEPT_CD = #dept_cd# CONNECT BY PRIOR DC.DEPT_CD = DC.DEPT_UPPER_CD )
AND ESNTL_ID <> #esntl_id#
ORDER BY DEPT_NM, USER_NM

SELECT RT.RC_NO, RT.CASE_NO, ( CASE WHEN RTA.ALOT_SE_CD = 'A' THEN '담당자배당' WHEN RTA.ALOT_SE_CD = 'B' THEN '부서배당' ELSE '' END ) AS ALOT_SE_NM, FN_DEPT_NM(RTA.ALOT_DEPT_CD) AS ALOT_DEPT_NM, RTA.ALOT_DEPT_CD, FN_USER_NM(RTA.ALOT_USER_ID) AS ALOT_USER_NM, RTA.ALOT_USER_ID, TO_CHAR(RTA.WRITNG_DT,'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss') AS WRITNG_DT FROM RC_TMPR RT LEFT JOIN RC_TMPR_ALOT RTA ON RT.RC_NO = RTA.RC_NO WHERE RT.RC_NO = #rc_no# AND RTA.USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY RTA.WRITNG_DT DESC
SELECT RC_NO, CASE_NO, ITIV_NO, PROGRS_STTUS_CD, CHARGER_ID FROM RC_TMPR WHERE RC_NO = #rc_no# AND USE_YN = 'Y'

SELECT RTA.RC_NO, RTA.ALOT_SN, RTA.ALOT_SE_CD, RTA.ALOT_DEPT_CD, FN_DEPT_NM(RTA.ALOT_DEPT_CD) AS ALOT_DEPT_NM, RTA.ALOT_USER_ID, FN_USER_NM(RTA.ALOT_USER_ID) AS ALOT_USER_NM, FN_DEPT_SINGLE_NM(RTA.ALOT_DEPT_CD) AS ALOT_DEPT_SINGLE_NM, RTA.MAIN_YN, RTA.USE_YN, RTA.WRITNG_ID, RTA.WRITNG_DT, RTA.UPDT_ID, RTA.UPDT_DT FROM RC_TMPR_ALOT RTA WHERE RTA.RC_NO = #rc_no# AND RTA.USE_YN = 'Y' AND RTA.MAIN_YN = 'Y'
sqlMap.insert:
INSERT INTO RC_TMPR_ALOT( RC_NO, ALOT_SN, ALOT_SE_CD, ALOT_DEPT_CD, ALOT_USER_ID, MAIN_YN, USE_YN, WRITNG_ID, WRITNG_DT ) VALUES ( #rc_no#, (SELECT NVL(MAX(ALOT_SN),0)+1 FROM RC_TMPR_ALOT WHERE RC_NO = #rc_no#), #alot_se_cd#,
(SELECT U.DEPT_CD FROM CMN_USER U WHERE U.ESNTL_ID = #alot_user_id#), #alot_user_id#,
#alot_dept_cd#, '',
'Y', 'Y', #esntl_id#, SYSDATE )
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RC_TMPR_ALOT SET USE_YN = 'N', UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE RC_NO = #rc_no# AND USE_YN = 'Y'
UPDATE RC_TMPR SET CHARGER_ID = #alot_user_id#, CHARGER_DEPT_CD = (SELECT U.DEPT_CD FROM CMN_USER U WHERE U.ESNTL_ID = #alot_user_id#), UPDT_ID = #esntl_id#, UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE RC_NO = #rc_no#
sqlMap.select:
SELECT X.*, 'N' CHK FROM ( SELECT A.*, COUNT(A.RC_NO) OVER() AS TOT_CNT,
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.$dataField$ $sortType$ NULLS LAST) RN
ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY A.RC_NO, A.USER_NM) RN
FROM ( SELECT A.CHARGER_ID , B.USER_NM , A.CHARGER_DEPT_CD , FN_DEPT_NM(A.CHARGER_DEPT_CD) CHARGER_DEPT_NM , A.RC_NO , REPLACE(TO_CHAR(A.RC_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI'), '00:00', '') RC_DT , A.RC_SE_CD , DECODE(A.RC_SE_CD, 'F', '정식', 'I', '내사', 'T', '임시') RC_SE_NM , A.INV_PROVIS_CD , FN_CD_NM(A.INV_PROVIS_CD) INV_PROVIS_NM , FN_RC_VIOLT_NM(A.RC_NO) VIOLT_NM , FN_RC_TRGTER_NM(A.RC_NO, '00697') SUSPCT_NM , FN_RC_TRGTER_NM(A.RC_NO, '00698') VICTIM_NM , FN_CD_NM(A.PROGRS_STTUS_CD) PROGRS_STTUS_NM , TRUNC(SYSDATE) - TRUNC(NVL(A.RC_DT, A.WRITNG_DT)) AS CF_DAYS FROM RC_TMPR A , CMN_USER B WHERE A.USE_YN = 'Y'
AND A.PROGRS_STTUS_CD IN ('02103','02121','02122','02131','02132','02141','02143') --미제사건
AND A.PROGRS_STTUS_CD IN ('02124', '02125') --중지사건만
AND A.PROGRS_STTUS_CD NOT IN (SELECT ESNTL_CD FROM CMN_CD WHERE UPPER_CD = '02100' AND CD_DC = 'END')
AND A.CHARGER_ID = B.ESNTL_ID
AND A.CHARGER_ID = #searchChager#
AND A.CHARGER_DEPT_CD IN ( SELECT DC.DEPT_CD FROM CMN_DEPT_CD DC WHERE DC.USE_YN = 'Y' AND DC.DEPT_CD != '00000' START WITH DC.DEPT_CD = #searchDeptCd# CONNECT BY PRIOR DC.DEPT_CD = DC.DEPT_UPPER_CD )
) A ) X
WHERE (RN > #startRow# AND RN <= #endRow#)
ORDER BY RN ASC
sqlMap.update: UPDATE RC_TMPR SET CHARGER_ID = #userId# , CHARGER_DEPT_CD = (SELECT U.DEPT_CD FROM CMN_USER U WHERE U.ESNTL_ID = #userId#) , UPDT_ID = #esntl_id# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE RC_NO IN #rc_no_arr[]#
UPDATE RC_TMPR_ALOT SET USE_YN = 'N' , UPDT_ID = #esntl_id# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND RC_NO IN #rc_no_arr[]#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO RC_TMPR_ALOT ( RC_NO , ALOT_SN , ALOT_SE_CD , ALOT_DEPT_CD , ALOT_USER_ID , MAIN_YN , USE_YN , WRITNG_ID , WRITNG_DT) SELECT RC_NO , (SELECT NVL(MAX(X.ALOT_SN), 0)+1 FROM RC_TMPR_ALOT X WHERE X.RC_NO = A.RC_NO) ALOT_SN , 'A' , (SELECT U.DEPT_CD FROM CMN_USER U WHERE U.ESNTL_ID = #userId#) , #userId# , 'Y' , 'Y' , #esntl_id# , SYSDATE FROM RC_TMPR A WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND RC_NO IN #rc_no_arr[]#
sqlMap.update: UPDATE CMN_SANCTN_MANAGE SET WRITNG_DEPT_CD = (SELECT U.DEPT_CD FROM CMN_USER U WHERE U.ESNTL_ID = #userId#) , WRITNG_ID = #userId# , UPDT_ID = #esntl_id# , UPDT_DT = SYSDATE , REGIST_PATH = REGIST_PATH || '(담당자변경)' WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' AND SANCTN_ID IN (SELECT A.SANCTN_ID FROM RC_TMPR A, CMN_SANCTN_CONFM B WHERE A.SANCTN_ID = B.SANCTN_ID AND B.USE_YN = 'Y' AND B.ORDR_YN = 'Y' AND B.STTUS_CD = '00022' AND A.RC_NO IN #rc_no_arr[]#)
